body:
I did this in overcast so I'm gonna do it here!

How it works:

1. I make categories and you guys vote who you think should be there.
2. On June 16th I will announce the Winners of Every award.

There is no actual prize but the prize is getting Nominated.

Awards!:

Greatest Person with a bow!:

Greatest Nexus player:

Greatest Pvper (Sword / Bow):

Greatest Player to talk to!:

Greatest Skin: 

Have any More award suggestions? Reply here and I will add them!

gl to all

title: The Avicus Awards!

replies.body:
• Greatest person with a bow: Celestrian572
  • Greatest Nexus player: StanMPL
  • Greatest PvPer Sword/Bow: That's a really tough question. I'd have to go with izjust4fun. (I didn't choose anyone that used to play a lot on OCN, because this is the Avicus awards, soz)
  • Greatest player to talk to: FightToWin7431 mah bb
  • Greatest skin: Mopsi303. No question.
